descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
# Push the limits, defy gravity, and perform insane stunts!

🎮 **Game Overview**: 
Stunt X Mania isn't just a game, it's an experience. Have you ever wondered if you could go crazy and perform insane motocross and stunts at home? We bring to you hyper-realistic bike controls like you've never experienced before! Hone your riding skills and go on a frenzy of stunts, wheelies, endos, 360 flips, and more. Our early access will help you get ready for our exciting next updates

🏁 **Key Features**
- Perform 360 flips, Superman, Cliffhanger, Lazy-boy, and Heel-clicker and more stunts!
- Enjoy a new hyper-realistic vehicle control system, with engaging clutch and gear mechanics, wheelies, endos, whips, and crazy jumps!

🕹️ **Game Modes**

- **Free Roam** -  No-holds barred, perform tricks without thinking of running out of time across 8 CRAZY ARENAS!

- **Career Mode** - Perform stunts to earn points and finish the lap before time ends and ride to glory among leaderboards! (COMING SOON)

- **Co-op** - Ride with friends and family, display your skills and become a pro! (COMING SOON)

- **Multiplayer** - Be the Master, champion lobbies, and boast your skills! (COMING SOON)

🎧 **Immersive Soundtrack**

- **High-energy electronic beats** to enhance your ride. Featuring tracks from our own indie-crew.

This is not the end! We will bring enhancing updates across the game, more stunts, new arenas, a brand new store, DLCs and more. **Stunt X Mania is the place to be, you can't miss it!**
